title: Skins
body: Hi riot i hsve seen the victorious skins i really want them is there a way i can get them for free

replies.body: Ty for the guide can i get to know which ultamite skin is up comming i think that there should be a  for taliyah or maby rework or lissandra  and mabey a cham as a mage who can do at least 3 roles like adc mid and support
Victorious skins can be rewarded by achieving Gold or higher in ranked!  Good luck!
